verses.name: Ezekiel 44:22
verses.text: Neither shall they take for their wives a widow, nor her that is put away: but they shall take maidens of the seed of the house of Israel, or a widow that had a priest before.

verses.name: Ezekiel 44:23
verses.text: And they shall teach my people the difference between the holy and profane, and cause them to discern between the unclean and the clean.

verses.name: Ezekiel 44:24
verses.text: And in controversy they shall stand in judgment; and they shall judge it according to my judgments: and they shall keep my laws and my statutes in all mine assemblies; and they shall hallow my sabbaths.
